params.name: do_resize
params.description: Whether to resize the images (height, width) dimensions to (size[height], size[width]). Can beoverridden by do_resize in preprocess.

params.name: size
params.type: Dict[str, int] optional, defaults to {"height" -- 224, "width": 224}):Size of the image after resizing. Can be overridden by size in preprocess.

params.name: resample
params.description: Resampling filter to use if resizing the image. Can be overridden by the resample parameter in thepreprocess method.

params.name: apply_ocr
params.description: Whether to apply the Tesseract OCR engine to get words + normalized bounding boxes. Can be overridden byapply_ocr in preprocess.

params.name: ocr_lang
params.description: The language, specified by its ISO code, to be used by the Tesseract OCR engine. By default, English isused. Can be overridden by ocr_lang in preprocess.

params.name: tesseract_config
params.description: Any additional custom configuration flags that are forwarded to the config parameter when callingTesseract. For example: â€”psm 6. Can be overridden by tesseract_config in preprocess.
